title: Parent educational tools on pain relief help reduce babies' vaccination distress

title_detail.value: Parent educational tools on pain relief help reduce babies' vaccination distress

summary: Information provided to new parents in hospital about how to alleviate pain for their babies during vaccination resulted in more frequent use of pain interventions at future infant vaccinations.

summary_detail.value: Information provided to new parents in hospital about how to alleviate pain for their babies during vaccination resulted in more frequent use of pain interventions at future infant vaccinations.
